title: When I use Chrome on my pixel 2 during a video half the screen is frozen with an image of a tab
content:
Hi 

On my pixel 2 when I use Google Chrome and I go full screen for any video and change to landscape half the screen is frozen with an image of a previous tab 
This happens intermittently

I have tried restarting phone 
Updating chrome 
Reinstalling chrome 
But it's just intermittent 
Any help is appreciated 
Thanks
